name: Money Dash
description:
Since you can win real money in the game, you need to be 13 years old to download and play the game. This is an action game that falls in the categories of endless run, casual and platform.

★ PLEASE READ THE ENTIRE DESCRIPTION.

Maybe you can find cool that it was made by a one-man team. Here you will find monsters, spells, knights, platforms, traps and much more. Easy to learn and hard to master. Try it and give us a lot of feedback. Join our legion of users that helps to make great this endless runner game.

FEATURES:

★ Real Money Payments.
★ Cloud Saved Game.
★ Many Free to Play Choices.
★ Choose your own special Runner and dash always to the future.
★ Beat monsters with your Sword to clear the way and earn money.
★ Special Skills to help you get further than anyone else.
★ A lot of Unique Monsters.
★ Beautiful Graphics. 
★ High Score System to showoff with your friends. (and be Paid)
★ Many Achievements, even hidden Special Ones.
★ Death is Not the End, you can "always" get an extra Life.

★ Click here Better Answers 

PAYMENTS:

★ The payments are automatics.
★ Only the HARD difficulty allows you to enter into the leader boards (and be paid). 
★ We pays 1% of the amount of players in the daily leader board.
Example:
There are 10 000 players today in the daily leader board so: 1 % 10000 = 100. The number 1 rank in this leader board at 8.00 pm hour of Paris, France, will receive the amount of €100 to his PayPal account if he configured one.
★ We are not responsible if the winning player forgot to configure his account. In this case he will not be paid.
★ Invite your friends to the game and ask them to put you as their referrer so if they win a the end of the day, you will also gain money.
★ You can not refer to yourself.
★ The referrer gains a BONUS 5% of the main prize.
★ If you have any problem, do not hesitate in contact us.

ADS:

★ Banner: Small, non intrusive banner in the bottom left corner.
★ Inter-site: On the title screen, there is a 25% chance of have one of these.
★ Rewarded: There are several of this kind. Example: getting an extra life on the game, to triplicate your level rewards, to gain extra rewards.

SUPPORTED LANGUAGES:

★ ENGLISH
★ SPANISH
★ FRENCH
★ GERMAN
★ ARABIC
★ CHINESE
★ JAPANESE
★ TURKISH
★ PORTUGUESE
★ HINDI
★ RUSSIAN
★ITALIAN

CONTACTS:
